# Church Postil

> Luther's Church Postil - One year lectionary sermons

## Documentation Sets

- [Luther's Church Postil](https://church-postil.vercel.app//llms-full.txt): Luther's Church postil in English and Danish Language.

## English Postil

- [Advent Postil](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/en/advent.md): The four Sundays in Advent
- [Christmas Postil](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/en/christmas.md): Christmas - Epiphany
- [Lent (Winter) Postil (1525)](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/en/lent.md): Epiphany Sundays - Pre-Lent - Lent - The Holy Friday
- [Easter (Summer) Postil](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/en/easter.md): Summer Postil; Easter Sunday - Pentecost
- [Trinity I Postil (1.-12.Sun.)](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/en/trinity1.md): Trinity Sunday - 12.Sunday after Trinity
- [Trinity II Postil (13.-26.Sun.)](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/en/trinity2.md): 13.Sunday after Trinity - 26.Sunday after Trinity
- [Church Postil (en/da)](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/en.md): Luther's Church Postil (Kirke Postille)
- [Test3](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/en/test3.md): Test3 with MdcTestTable3

## Danish Postil

- [Luther\'s' vejledning](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/intro.md): Vejledning fra Luther og forord fra lutherdansk
- [Advent postille](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent-postil.md): Epistler og evangelier for de fire søndager i advent.
- [Jule Postille](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas-postil.md): Epistler og evangelier for Julehøytiden; Julaften -> Hellige tre kongers dag.
- [Lent (Vinter) Postille](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/lent-postil.md): Åbenbarings søndagene - Den stille uge
- [Easter (Sommer) Postille](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/easter-postil.md): Sommer (Påske) Postille; 1. Påskedag - Pinse
- [Trefoldighed 1. Postille (1.-12.Søn.)](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/trinity1-postil.md): Trefoldighed søndag - 12.Søndag efter Trefoldighed
- [Trefoldighed 2. Postille (13.-26.Søn.)](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/trinity2-postil.md): 13.Søndag efter trefoldighed - 26.Søndag efter Trefoldighed
- [Lærerike prædikener](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/uddrag.md): Prædikener som behandler viktige lærestykker
- [Lære-stykker/-sitater](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/uddrag/laerestykker.md): De viktigste lære-stykker og sitater
- [Bibelsitater/-vers](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/uddrag/bibleref.md): Bibelsitater/-vers som behandler viktige lærestykker
- [Vederkvegende trøsterike uttalelser](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/uddrag/vederkvegelse.md): De mest verkvegende uttalelsene i Kirke Postillen
- [Oversikt Advent prædikener](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent.md): Epistler og evangelier for de fire søndager i advent.
- [1. Epistel - Rom 13, 11-14](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent/epistle1.md): Epistel 1.søndag i advent; Rom 13, 11-14
- [1. Evang. - Matt 21, 1-9](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent/gospel1.md): Evangeliet 1.søndag i advent; Matt 21, 1-9
- [2. Epistel - Rom 15, 4-13](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent/epistle2.md): Epistel 2.søndag i advent; Rom 15, 4-13
- [2. Evang. - Luk 21, 25-36](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent/gospel2.md): Evangeliet 2.søndag i advent; Luk 21, 25-36
- [3. Epistel - 1 Kor 4, 1-5](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent/epistle3.md): Epistel 3.søndag i advent; 1 Kor 4, 1-5
- [3. Evang. - Matt 11, 2-10](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent/gospel3.md): Evangeliet 3.søndag i advent; Matt 11, 2-10
- [4. Epistel - Fil 4, 4-7](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent/epistle4.md): Epistel 4.søndag i advent; Fil 4, 4-7
- [4. Evang. - Joh 1, 19-28](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/advent/gospel4.md): Evangeliet 4.søndag i advent; Joh 1, 19-28
- [Oversikt Jule prædikener](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas.md): Epistler og evangelier for Julehøytiden; Julaften -> Hellige tre kongers dag.
- [Juleaften - Tit 2, 11-15](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/epistle-juleaften.md): Epistel Juleaften; Titus 2, 11-15
- [Juleaften - Luk 2, 1-14](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/gospel-juleaften.md): Evangeliet Juleaften; Luk 2, 1-14
- [Første Juledag - Tit 3, 4-7](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/1.epistle-juledag.md): 1 Epistel 1 Juledag; Titus 3, 4-7
- [Første Juledag - Luk 2, 15-20](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/1.gospel-juledag.md): 1 Evangelium 1 Juledag; Luk 2, 15-20
- [Første Juledag - Hebr 1, 1-12](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/2.epistle-juledag.md): 2 Epistel 1 Juledag; Hebr 1, 1-12
- [Første Juledag - Joh 1, 1-14](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/2.gospel-juledag.md): 2 Evangelium 1 Juledag; Joh 1, 1-14
- [Anden Juledag - Apg 6, 8-15 & 7, 54-60](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/epistle-2.juledag.md): Epistel 2 Juledag; Apg 6, 8-15 & 7, 54-60
- [Anden Juledag - Matt 23, 34-39](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/gospel-2.juledag.md): Evangelium 2 Juledag; Matt 23, 34-39
- [Tredje Juledag - Sir 15, 1-6](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/epistle-3-juledag.md): Epistel 3 Juledag; Sirak 15, 1-6
- [Tredje Juledag - Joh 21, 19-23](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/gospel-3.juledag.md): Evangelium 3 Juledag; Joh 21, 19-23
- [Julesøndag - Gal 4, 1-7](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/epistle-julesondag.md): Epistel Julesøndag; Gal 4, 1-7
- [Julesøndag - Luk 2, 33-40](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/gospel-julesondag.md): Evangelium Julesøndag; Luk 2, 33-40
- [Nytårsdag - Gal 3, 23-29](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/epistle-nyaarsdag.md): Epistel Nytårsdag; Gal 3, 23-29
- [Nytårsdag - Luk 2, 21](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/gospel-nyaarsdag.md): Evangelium Nytårsdag; Luk 2, 21
- [Helligtrekongersdag - Es 60, 1-6](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/epistle-helligtrekonger.md): Epistel Helligtrekongersdag; Esajas 60, 1-6
- [Helligtrekongersdag - Matt 2, 1-12](https://church-postil.vercel.app/raw/da/christmas/gospel-helligtrekonger.md): Evangelium Helligtrekongersdag; Matt 2, 1-12
